C

ChatController - Class in Controller
The ChatController class manages the interaction between the user interface and the ChatModel in the context of a chat application.
ChatController(ChatModel) - Constructor for class Controller.ChatController
Constructs a new ChatController instance with the specified ChatModel and sets up listeners to handle incoming messages.
ChatModel - Class in Models
The ChatModel class provides functionality for managing chat-related operations.
ChatModel(String, Socket) - Constructor for class Models.ChatModel
Constructs a new instance of ChatModel with the specified username and socket.
ChatTabPageView - Class in Views.TabPages
The ChatTabPageView class provides a tab page for managing chat-related content in the main window.
ChatTabPageView(ChatController, String) - Constructor for class Views.TabPages.ChatTabPageView
Constructs a ChatTabPageView object with the provided ChatController and username.
Client - Class in Unnamed Package
The Client class serves as the entry point for the client application.
Client() - Constructor for class Client
Constructs a Client object.
ClientHandler - Class in Unnamed Package
The ClientHandler class represents a server-side component responsible for handling communication with a client.
ClientHandler(Socket) - Constructor for class ClientHandler
Constructs a ClientHandler object for a given socket connection.
clientHandlers - Static variable in class ClientHandler
A list of all active client handlers.
closeEverything(Socket, ObjectInputStream, ObjectOutputStream) - Method in class ClientHandler
Closes all associated resources including socket, input stream, and output stream.
closeEverything(Socket, ObjectInputStream, ObjectOutputStream) - Method in class Models.ChatModel
Closes the socket, ObjectInputStream, and ObjectOutputStream.
closeServerSocket() - Method in class Server
Closes the server socket.
confirmChanges(INotifyValidationChanged, String, int) - Method in class Controller.SettingsController
Validates the provided address and port, updates the SettingsModel if valid, and notifies the sender about the validation results for both address and port.
ControlBase - Class in Views.Controls
The ControlBase class provides a common foundation for custom controls in the application.
ControlBase() - Constructor for class Views.Controls.ControlBase
Constructs a new instance of ControlBase, initializing the control as not visible.
Controller - package Controller
 
ControllerBase - Class in Controller
The abstract class ControllerBase serves as a base implementation for controller classes.
ControllerBase() - Constructor for class Controller.ControllerBase
Constructor creates a new instance of ControllerBase and initializes the listeners list.
